dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2780 IH: Setting the Table for Transition Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Kennedy of New York introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To temporarily expand the supplemental nutrition assistance program income eligibility of households that include certain veterans.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Setting the Table for Transition Act.

section.header: Temporary expanded SNAP income eligibility of households that include certain veterans
section.text: For the purpose of determining income under the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2011 et seq.) during the 100-day period that begins on the date a veteran receives a Report of Separation (DD form 214) of a household that includes a member who is a veteran, only the income of such veteran shall be considered.

For purposes of this Act, the term veteran means an individual who served in the active military, naval, or air service, and who was discharged or released therefrom under conditions other than dishonorable.
This Act shall take effect 90 days after the date of the enactment of this Act.
